newsitem.title: USA: Albert to broadcast NBA playoff on NBC.
newsitem.headline: Albert to broadcast NBA playoff on NBC.

text.p: Sportscaster Marv Albert Thursday denied allegations that he sexually assaulted a Virginia woman and will broadcast the NBA playoffs on NBC as scheduled, the network announced Thursday.

In a statement, NBC said that before the allegations were made public Tuesday, Albert "at no time was ever afforded any opportunity to discuss the facts with police or prosecuting attorneys." Albert was expected to make his own public statement later Thursday.
